title: Postdoctoral Associate in computational biology
description:
Classification Title:

Postdoctoral Associate¬†



Job Description:

Dr. Xiao Fan‚Äôs laboratory (https://xiaofan-lab.github.io/) in the Department of Biomedical Engineering at the University of Florida has a fully-funded postdoctoral associate position. Fan Lab aims to understand genetic causes of rare human diseases using case-control association studies, and improving interpretation of genetic variations using machine learning methods. Research projects will involve study design, data acquisition, method development, data analysis, and software/database maintenance.



Expected Salary:

Salary will commensurate with experience and will follow NIH guidelines.



Minimum Requirements:


PhD in computer science, statistical genetics, bioinformatics or related quantitative subject.




Preferred Qualifications:


Experience with high performance computing
Experience with deep learning modelling
Experience with bioinformatics projects
Relevant publications in peer-reviewed journals
Ability to mentor junior team members
A strong background in programming (e.g. python or R)
Demonstrated experience with machine learning modelling
Interest in learning biological/genetic concepts
Excellent communication skills




Special Instructions to Applicants:

Interested applicants should send a CV, statement of interest, and contact information for three references to xiaofan@ufl.edu.
Time limited positions are based on circumstances, such as funding sources, which control the length of time for which the position is available. A time-limited position has the same rights as a position with a regular appointment modifier, except such position does not have rights provided for layoff, recall, and notice of non-reappointment. It is at the discretion of the college or unit to determine if a position is time-limited.
Applications must be submitted by 11:55 p.m. of the posting end date.



Health Assessment Required:
No
